summary:
Lakshmi Priya is a Consultant with 15+ years of experience. She has been involved in a range of interventions that involve Business Transformation, Change Management, Portfolios, AGILE transformation, organizational development, talent &leadership development and trainings that have had a direct impact on company profitability. Her work exposure is complemented with a MBA. She is a Certified SCRUM Master, an NLP certified Master practitioner along with being certified in Life Coaching and Accelerated Learning methodologies. 
As a portfolio consultant, she works on multiple transformation projects that range from building utilities and capabilities, process optimization, transformation and business enhancement. As a Coach, she has designed and executed assessments and delivered modules along with individual coaching, on various behavioral aspects, such as Client Centricity, Leadership development, Diversity and Inclusion, Managerial Development, Assessment Centers and Competency Based Interviewing, Planning and Strategizing, Goal Setting, Communication Skill, Motivating Teams, Client Management, Performance Management and Coaching for the next level. Her large focus remains on creating a diverse work culture and helping Managers create High Performing Teams using AGILE framework for process, culture and behavioral transformation.
